definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

pinyin: Ka3 er3 wen2 Ke4 lai2 yin1

sentences.english: The early settlers believed in Calvinist restraint.
sentences.chinese: 早期的美國移民是卡爾文式禁慾主義的信民。

sentences.english: Calvin had no problem adjusting—he drew people to him like a magnet.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾文沒有調整他畫人對他象磁鐵的問題。

sentences.english: The U.S.S. Carl Vinson, site of tonight’s game.
sentences.chinese: 今晚比賽的地點，卡爾文森號航空母艦。
